error_loading_pollen: An error occurred loading the pollen types & descriptions:
thankfully_not_allergic: Thankfully, we're not allergic to errors.
risk_description: The risk index reflects the highest pollen level among your selected types for today.
ozone_description: High ozone levels can intensify allergic reactions by making airways more sensitive and pollen more irritating.
weather_description: Thunderstorms can worsen allergic reactions by causing pollen grains to break apart and become more easily inhaled. Rain may bring short-term relief.
air_quality_description: Poor air quality (high AQI) can worsen allergic reactions by increasing airborne irritants that inflame the airways and amplify sensitivity to pollen.
unsupported_country_message: This country is not yet supported by our pollen data provider.
limited_data_message: Pollen data is limited to grasses for this country.
rate_us_message: Enjoying Pollinate? Your rating would mean the world!
